title: UNP is not sinking due to disunity but because of its leader
content: News Source: TC – by Dayan Jayatilleke I am not now and have never been a member of either the SLFP or the UNP, though President Premadasa urged me to ‘come in through the National List, take a portfolio and do a job of work’. The only registered political party (as distinct from political organisation)…
